company_address: Plot No: 79, Road No: 10B, Uttara, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Managing inventory, overseeing store operations, and ensuring all store activities such as receiving, storing, and dispatching materials. Maintaining accurate inventory records through stock checks and reconciliations and preparing reports on stock levels and transactions. Receiving incoming materials and verifying quantity and quality against purchase orders and delivery challans. Maintaining accurate records of stock (raw materials, finished goods, accessories, and trims). Updating stock levels in ERP/software or manual stock registers. Storing materials in a clean, organized, and safe environment. Segregating shipment products that are processed for delivery or tracking inward and outward movement of goods. Keeping track of returnable products (e.g. unused trims, accessories, and raw materials). Preparing daily/weekly/monthly stock reports as well as monitoring shortages of products. Ensuring the security and safety of inventories to prevent damages effectively.

Responsibilities: Hunt and identify new potential clients.
Acquire new orders from newly onboarded clients.
Onboard new clients on a daily basis to expand the customer base.
Maintain strong and positive relationships with existing clients.
Execute marketing campaigns via Email and WhatsApp.
Target and approach retail stores and grocery shops for business development.

Hunt and identify new potential clients. Acquire new orders from newly onboarded clients. Onboard new clients on a daily basis to expand the customer base. Maintain strong and positive relationships with existing clients. Execute marketing campaigns via Email and WhatsApp. Target and approach retail stores and grocery shops for business development.

Responsibilities: 1. Brand Promotion & Awareness
- Promote SKRP products to retailers, electricians, and end customers.
- Communicate product features, benefits, and usage effectively.
- Support marketing campaigns, roadshows, and in-market activation programs.

2. Merchandising & Display
- Ensure all products are properly displayed and branded at retail points.
- Place promotional materials (banners, posters, danglers, etc.) in assigned outlets.
- Regularly check visibility and replace damaged or outdated materials.

3. Market Visit & Support
- Visit outlets daily as per route plan and maintain strong relationships with shop owners.
- Assist the Sales Executive in collecting orders (memos) from retailers.
- Identify new outlets for product placement and promotion.

4. Feedback & Reporting
- Collect feedback from retailers, electricians, and customers about products and competitors.
- Report daily market activities, feedback, and promotional performance to the TSM/RSM.
- Share photos or records of display, branding, and campaign participation.

5. Event & Campaign Support
- Participate in trade shows, fairs, dealer meetings, and promotional events.
- Coordinate with marketing team for special campaigns and seasonal offers.
- Represent the brand positively and maintain professional appearance and behavior.

Requirements: Skills & Abilities:
- Good communication and presentation skills.
- Confident, energetic, and brand-oriented mindset.
- Ability to engage with retailers and customers effectively.
- Willing to work in the field and travel frequently.

Responsibilities: Job Description: 1. Providing quality customer service by effectively communicating with customers to answer questions.
2. Communicating and responding effectively to customer questions, locating merchandise, and providing requested assistance on merchandise.
3. Ensuring a safe and clean environment by maintaining safety standards, maintenance, and cleanliness as required by the department.
4. Maintaining the overall appearance of the bakery area by keeping merchandise and displays fully stocked, properly signed, neat, clean, and organized.
5. Following established procedures to process damaged goods, merchandise left behind, and outdated bakery merchandise.
6. Cake Writing skill.
7. Maintain health, safety, and security of the customer.
8. Ensure the best customer service.
9. Prepare, Decorate & Service the food.
10. Ensure payment from the customer.
11. Maintain the cleaning and hygiene of the outlet.

Responsibilities: The renowned institution "Glory Distributing Corporation" located in Savar will be recruiting some Distribution Sales Supervisors (DSS) - Responsibilities and Duties: 1) Responsible for managing DSOs as team leaders of 7/8 members. 2) Monitoring the services provided to DSO agents in the office's market area. 3) Achieving all targets given from the office through team members every month. 4) Ensuring that DSOs understand any new communication from bKash beautifully. 5) After finishing the morning meeting and going to the market, must stay on their own route without providing service or achieving targets. 6) Must know if DSOs are providing money receipts and balance or cash with every transaction with agents. Candidates must have a national ID card, citizenship certificate, and a bank account.

Requirements: Must have minimum HSC pass if experienced. Salary: 19500/- with all facilities. Other benefits: Transportation cost, bonuses on two Eids, incentive from bKash. Interested candidates are invited to send their CV, photocopy of voter ID, and photocopies of all certificates to the address below for sending self-application. [Note: Experienced candidates will be given priority for employment in Grameenphone, Banglalink, Airtel, Robi, bKash, Cash, or MFIs.] Contact: Md. Nuruzzaman AGM-Admin Mobile: 01937554602, 01758568092 Email: mdnuruzzaman506@gmail.com Address: Amin Tower (4th floor), Bazar Road, Savar, Dhaka.

Responsibilities: ‚ú≥Ô∏è Job Summary
The General Manager will be responsible for the overall management, operational control, compliance, financial oversight, and business growth of the company's three mobile retail shops dealing with imported mobile phone sets. The role requires strong leadership, integrity, discipline, and experience in administration and governance.

üõÑ Key Roles & Responsibilities
‚úÖ Business Growth & Planning
- Develop detailed strategies, action plans, and timelines to increase the company's products and services and expand business operations.
- Identify opportunities for business improvement, operational efficiency, and sustainable growth.

‚úÖ Operations & Team Management
- Oversee daily operations of all three mobile shops and ensure smooth workflow.
- Lead, manage, and supervise shop managers and staff, ensuring discipline, coordination, and performance improvement.
- Conduct regular shop visits and performance evaluations.

‚úÖ Customer Care & Service Excellence
- Ensure high-quality customer care services across all outlets.
- Maintain strong relationships with customers and resolve major complaints or disputes professionally.

‚úÖ Inventory & Asset Control
- Monitor inward and outward movement of mobile phones and accessories.
- Ensure proper documentation, IMEI records, stock registers, and prevention of stock loss or misuse.
- Verify inventory reports and ensure transparency in stock management.

‚úÖ Financial Oversight & Confidentiality
- Oversee all financial transactions of the company, including sales, expenses, cash handling, and bank deposits.
- Supervise loan disbursement and recovery (if applicable) in accordance with company policies.
- Maintain strict confidentiality of all financial transactions, records, and sensitive company information.

‚úÖ Compliance & Governance
- Ensure compliance with government regulations, customs documentation, VAT, tax, and company policies.
- Maintain proper records to support audits, inspections, and regulatory requirements.

‚úÖ Staff & Customer Welfare
- Ensure customers and office staff receive all benefits, facilities, and entitlements as per company rules and policies.
- Promote ethical practices, fairness, and professionalism within the organization.

‚úÖ Reporting & Coordination
- Prepare and submit regular operational and financial reports to ownership/management.
- Coordinate closely with accounts, operations, suppliers, and other stakeholders.
- Report risks, irregularities, or operational issues promptly with recommendations for corrective action.

Preferred Candidate Profile
Age: 25-65 years
Background: Retired Army / Defense / Banker / College or University Teacher / Government Service
Strong leadership, integrity, administrative experience, and decision-making ability

Responsibilities: - Oversee all branch operations to ensure smooth daily functioning, timely problem resolution, and consistent service delivery.
- Drive sales growth through targeted marketing initiatives, customer engagement programs, and local outreach activities.
- Develop and execute plans to strengthen brand visibility and increase market share within the local community.
- Recruit, coach, and mentor staff to build a high-performing, customer-focused team while promoting continuous development.
- Set clear performance targets to optimize sales, service, and operational results.
- Maintain excellent customer satisfaction by instilling a culture of responsiveness, quality service, and effective complaint resolution.
- Manage budgets, control costs, and oversee inventory and resource allocation to maximize branch profitability.
- Ensure compliance with company policies, regulatory requirements, and risk-management procedures to protect assets and reputation.
- Implement process improvements and best practices that enhance efficiency, reduce waste, and improve the customer experience.
- Prepare regular operational and performance reports for senior management and propose actionable recommendations.

Requirements: Core competencies
- Demonstrated domain expertise in clothing/fashion retail with hands-on knowledge of both front-of-house (sales floor, customer interaction, visual presentation) and back-of-house activities (receiving, stockroom management, tagging, and pricing).
- Strong branch operations capability: manage opening/closing procedures, daily workflow coordination, staff handovers, and timely escalation of operational issues to protect service continuity.
- Proven leadership and team-building skills: recruit, onboard, coach, motivate, and, where necessary, apply fair disciplinary measures to maintain a high-performing, customer-focused team.
- Customer service orientation with demonstrated ability to resolve escalated complaints, restore customer trust, and turn service recovery into repeat business.
- Commercial mindset: consistently identify and act on local sales opportunities (in-store promotions, events, and targeted customer outreach) to grow footfall and average transaction value.
- Decisive problem-solver who diagnoses operational issues quickly, prioritizes actions, and implements practical solutions under time constraints.

Technical and operational skills
- Point of sale (POS) and retail systems proficiency: operate and train others on POS platforms, inventory management modules, and basic CRM tools; comfortable troubleshooting common POS issues and performing end-of-day reconciliations.
- Inventory management and stock control: run cycle counts, execute stock reconciliations, investigate and reduce shrinkage, manage inbound/outbound shipments, and maintain accurate stock records to prevent stockouts and overstocks.
- Visual merchandising and product presentation: implement planograms, lead seasonal displays, and in-store

Responsibilities: Supervisors must provide full assistance to achieve departmental sales targets. Provide complete service to customers through communication with them. Ensure highest level of customer satisfaction through customer service. Arrange and display products according to the planogram. Ensure correct packaging and delivery according to standard operating procedures. Adhere to cleanliness and hygiene regulations in the workplace. Inventory of free products must be done and products must be provided to customers based on offers and promotions. Follow the rules and regulations of Queue Management System directed by the Line Manager. Regularly check expiration dates of products and report to the Line Manager. Maintain cleanliness and hygiene of shelves, workstations, and customer service areas. Assist in receiving, loading, unloading, and shelving products from the warehouse and suppliers.

Requirements: Duty Hours: 8 hours duty (Friday and Saturday - 12 hours duty) Roster duty based on shifts. Morning shift: 8 am to 4 pm, Evening shift: 2 pm to 10 pm As per outlet manager's instructions, work on any day and any shift. Weekly off: 1 day (except Friday and Saturday based on roster) Only interested candidates are requested to come for direct interview at Agora Super Shop outlets in Uttara, Gulshan, Mohammadpur, Banasree, Indira Road, Green Road, Aftabnagar, Segunbagicha, Dhanmondi, Moghbazar. Interview Day and Time: Every Sunday at 3 pm Direct Interview Address: Agora Head Office, MBON Complex (Lift-7), 99, Mohakhali, Dhaka (Near Amtoli Square, next to Ban Bhaban) Be sure to bring your CV and national ID card or birth registration copy for the direct interview at the mentioned address.

Responsibilities: Handle inbound calls and messages with a friendly, professional tone, ensuring customers feel heard and supported.

Conduct targeted outbound calls to follow up on leads, confirm orders, and encourage repeat purchases.

Respond promptly to customer queries across phone, Facebook Messenger, and website chat, tailoring solutions to individual needs.

Accurately update and maintain customer records in the CRM, logging interactions, outcomes, and agreed next steps.

Communicate clearly and courteously, adopting a solution-focused approach to resolve issues and build customer trust.

Recommend relevant products and promotions during conversations to help customers find the best fit.

Monitor call outcomes, lead status, and conversion metrics to identify opportunities for improvement.

Collaborate closely with fulfillment, support, and marketing teams to ensure smooth order processing and consistent customer experiences.

Stay up to date on product details, promotions, and policy changes to provide accurate information and confident recommendations.

Share regular feedback on customer trends and process improvements to enhance service quality and sales performance.

Active listening and empathy‚Äîaccurately identify customer needs, confirm understanding, and respond with appropriate solutions or escalation steps.

Persuasive conversational skills‚Äîgently guide customers toward useful products or actions without being pushy; use probing questions to uncover opportunities.

Problem solving with a solution-focused mindset‚Äîevaluate issues quickly, propose practical options, and follow through until the customer is satisfied.

Time management and prioritization‚Äîhandle multiple inquiries across channels while meeting SLAs and follow-up commitments.

job_description:
Responsibilities: We are searching for a proactive and detail-oriented HR Officer who will be responsible for carrying out day-to-day HR operations, ensuring smooth hiring processes, and managing employees across IFixFast and its sister concern, Amdox Operation. The ideal candidate should possess strong communication skills, organizational abilities, and a solid understanding of HR practices.

Key Responsibilities:
- Manage end-to-end recruitment: job posting, screening, shortlisting, interviewing, and onboarding.
- Maintain accurate employee records, attendance, and HR documentation.
- Support daily HR operational tasks and ensure timely execution of all HR activities.
- Coordinate and manage employees working under IFixFast and Amdox Operation.
- Assist in implementing HR policies, procedures, and compliance requirements.
- Handle employee queries, provide grievance support, and maintain a positive workplace environment.
- Monitor training sessions, performance updates, and staff development activities.
- Prepare HR reports and provide HR-related insights to management.
- Ensure smooth coordination between both companies for operational HR needs.

Employment Details:
Job Location: IFixFast & Amdox Operation
Working Hours: As per company policy
Salary: Negotiable (based on experience)
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements: - Bachelor's degree in HRM, Business Administration, or a related field.
- 1-3 years of experience in HR or recruitment roles (preferred).
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
- Proficiency in MS Office and HR tools/software.
- Strong understanding of HR operations and compliance.
- Good Knowledge of Excel

- Ensure regular follow-ups with each lead.
- Provide effective and efficient solutions to customer queries or concerns.
- Increase sales through upselling and cross-selling.
- Maintain customer satisfaction and ensure repeat sales.

- Only males can apply.
- Must perform prayers.
- Perform work efficiently.
- Be serious about work.

- Get help from experienced people.
- Salary will increase based on work skills.
- Festival bonus - 2.

Responsibilities: *Job Title:* Business Development Executive

*Company Name:* Carnival Mart

*Location:* Own district

*Job Type:* Part-time

*Working Hours:* 4 hours daily (flexible)

*Salary:* Fixed - 8,000 BDT/month

*Other Benefits:*
- Part-time executives will not be provided any additional TA/DA. Based on performance, dedication to work, not deviating from rules and regulations, besides the basic salary, a daily allowance of 200 BDT will be provided, in that case, the monthly salary for part-time executives with TA/DA is fixed at 13,200 BDT. Opportunity to become a full-time executive is available. In that case, promotion and TA/DA will be provided according to the company's specified rules.

*Job Summary:*
We are looking to hire proactive and self-motivated individuals for the position of Business Development Executive. The job will involve field-level marketing, building and maintaining relationships with clients, and promoting the company's products and services - "without any sales targets". Candidates are free to work independently for any 4 hours a day.

*Key Responsibilities:*
- Presenting company products to potential clients/organizations
- Establishing and maintaining professional client relationships
- Monitoring market conditions and providing feedback reports
- Documenting reports and activities according to company policies

*Qualifications:*
- Educational Qualification: Minimum HSC; Graduates will be preferred
- Both freshers and experienced candidates can apply
- Must have good communication and comprehension skills
- Must be confident, punctual, and professional
- Proficiency in smartphone usage and reporting is necessary

*Additional Information:*
- Fixed Salary: 8,000 BDT/month
- TA/DA will not be provided
- Training will be provided
- Evaluation based on performance
- Opportunity for promotion to full-time position in the future.

Requirements: Fluent, quick-witted, and socially minded

Responsibilities: Company Overview: Wellspring Bangladesh Ltd. is the Bangladesh arm of Wellspring Global Pte Ltd, a Singapore-based consumer healthcare company. Our mission is to make essential wellness solutions‚Äîparticularly safe drinking water and fortified nutrition products‚Äîaccessible and affordable to underserved and mass-affluent populations in Bangladesh. All our efforts are aligned with key UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), focusing on public health, nutrition, and clean water. Position Overview: The TSM will lead the Territory sales operations, ensuring optimal market penetration, distributor/channel development, retail execution, and team leadership. This is a strategic role crucial to scaling revenue, expanding distribution, and building visibility for Wellspring‚Äôs product portfolio. Key Responsibilities: 1. Drive territory sales targets and execute the business plan. 2. Manage distributors, channels, stock, and secondary sales. 3. Ensure strong retail execution, visibility, and new outlet activation. 4. - Proficient in MS Office and Google Workspace (Word, Excel, Docs, Sheets, Email)

- Customer-oriented, responsible, and professional work attitude
- Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team

job_description:
Responsibilities: Registered and licensed institutions will hire a significant number of security guards for the protection and surveillance of domestic and foreign Chinese and Indian projects, mills, factories, warehouses, houses, showrooms, banks, and ATM booths.

Requirements: No need for experience or guarantee here. Other facilities: Free accommodation. Bonus salary given by the 10th of each month. Adequate overtime benefits available. Free medical treatment, bonus for 2 festivals per year. Attendance bonus equivalent to 1 day's attendance. Salary will increase in the first 6 months and annually thereafter. Those who are willing to work can contact the office directly or via WhatsApp. Contact: 01911131063 Yatrabari, Kajla Bridge.

Responsibilities: Responsibilities Section:
Motivate and guide sales staff to improve productivity
- Ensure product availability and effective stock rotation
- Support promotions, campaigns, and discount activities
- Ensure high customer service standards across the store
- Handle customer complaints and escalations efficiently
- Monitor customer feedback and implement improvements
- Supervise sales associates, cashiers, and floor staff
- Prepare duty rosters and manage attendance, leave, and punctuality
- Train staff on product knowledge, SOPs, and customer handling
- Monitor staff grooming, behavior, and discipline

- Reduce pilferage, damages, and stock discrepancies
- Assist in stock counts and internal audits
- Prepare daily/weekly sales and operational reports
- Ensure compliance with SOPs, safety rules, and the Bangladesh Labor Law
- Support the Store Manager during inspections and audits

Responsibilities: In the areas of Panthapath, Rampura, Mohammadpur, Sher-e-Bangla Nagar, and Uttarkhan, there are vacancies.

Salary:
Cyclist: 9,834 - 13,434 BDT. (Having a bicycle is necessary)
- Shifts from 7 AM, 9 AM, and 10:45 AM.
- 12-hour duty.
- One day off every 3 consecutive days, 8 days off per month.
- Monthly mobile bill provided.
- Delivery bonus:
  - 10 BDT bonus for each delivery from 18 to 24.
  - 15 BDT bonus for all deliveries after 24.
Incentive scheme available.
Other benefits:
- Salary increment after six months.
- Festival allowance given twice a year.
- 14 days sick leave per year after six months.
- 11 days festival leave per year after six months.
- 12 days earned leave per year after six months.
- 10 days casual leave per year after six months.

company_address: B I S T Bhaban,5th Floor, Holding # 122/A, Kakrail Road, Dhaka-1000(Near Habibullah Bahar College)
job_description:
Responsibilities: Are you hardworking, ambitious, and want to establish yourself in life through honest means?

If so, there is a golden opportunity for you to work as a Financial Associate at MetLife, a leading American financial organization in Bangladesh for over 70 years.

Join now and become a representative of MetLife, contribute to society/country, and fulfill your dreams.

Position: 'Financial Associate'

Job Description: As a Financial Associate, you can brighten your future and contribute to a great cause by working at 'H.K. Khan Agency' with MetLife in Bangladesh.

Why become a Financial Associate at MetLife?

- Opportunity for rapid career advancement through your hard work and skills
- Financial Associate ----> Unit Manager ----> Branch Manager

Financial Benefits:

1. Quick start to earnings after joining
2. Annual average income of 40 lakhs for the top 50 performers
3. Annual average income of 20 lakhs for the top 100 performers, along with other bonuses
4. Special recognition and rewards for exceptional performance

Opportunities for Dream Fulfillment:

1. International and domestic travel
2. Recognition at international conferences
3. Medical coverage for family
4. Provident fund
5. Scholarships for children's education

Chances of Quick Success:

1. World-class training facilities
2. Skilled trainers
3. Digital workspace
4. 100% online-based programs
5. Digital tools for sales and activity management

Opportunity for Personal Business:

1. Opportunity to start your own business without any investment
2. Rapid promotion based on performance to become a Unit Manager and later a Branch Manager
3. Opportunity to start an agency in your name
4. Work flexibility according to your convenience

Responsibilities: Assist millions of people in the country by providing health and financial security, establish and maintain relationships with clients to achieve business goals.

Work Flexibility: Part-time and full-time job opportunities.

Contact:
'H.K. Khan Agency'
MetLife, Bangladesh

Address: B I S T Bhaban, 5th Floor, Holding # 122/A, Kakrail Road, Dhaka-1000 (Near Habibullah Bahar College)

Phone Number: 01715564488

"If you are ready to take on challenges and want to tread the path of a successful career, then apply today to join this dynamic team at DUDANT."

Requirements: Qualification: Masters from HSC. Age: 25 or above.

company_address: Plot No: 67, Road No: 10 Uttara, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Akidah Electro Mart is seeking dynamic, customer-oriented, and driven Showroom Salesmen who can confidently engage with customers, understand their requirements, and promote a diverse range of electronic home appliances such as TVs, air conditioners, fans, lights, refrigerators, washing machines, microwave ovens, and other electronics.

The ideal candidate should possess excellent communication skills, product knowledge, and the ability to convert potential customers into actual buyers while delivering exceptional customer service.

Responsibilities include:
- Greeting and assisting customers professionally in the showroom.
- Identifying customer needs and suggesting suitable electronic products.
- Demonstrating product features, advantages, and usage.
- Maintaining comprehensive knowledge of all showroom products.
- Meeting monthly sales targets set by management.
- Ensuring products are displayed neatly and attractively.
- Regularly inspecting and maintaining product cleanliness and functionality for demonstrations.
- Managing stock information and updating inventory records.
- Handling customer inquiries, complaints, and post-sales support with courtesy.

Akidah Electro Mart is looking for energetic, customer-friendly, and motivated Showroom Salesmen who can confidently handle customers, understand their needs, and promote a wide range of electronic home appliances, including TV, AC, Fan, Light, Refrigerator, Washing Machine, Microwave Oven, and other electronics. The candidate should have strong communication skills, product knowledge, and the ability to convert visitors into buyers while ensuring excellent customer service. Welcome and approach customers professionally inside the showroom. Understand customer needs and recommend appropriate electronics products. Demonstrate product features, benefits, and usage. Maintain in-depth knowledge of all showroom products (TV, AC, Fan, Light, Washing Machine, Oven, etc.). Achieve monthly sales targets assigned by the management. Ensure products are displayed neatly and attractively. Regularly check and keep products clean, functional, and ready for demonstration. Maintain proper stock information and update inventory records. Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and after-sales support courteously.

job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for a Delivery & Operations Trainer who will collaborate directly with the Operations team to train delivery staff on app usage, operational procedures, and sales generation. This position also involves working closely with internal teams like Returns and Distribution to ensure a seamless end-to-end delivery and service experience for pharmacy partners.

Key Responsibilities:

- Provide training to delivery staff on the Healthos mobile application, covering order management, delivery confirmation, returns, and issue reporting.
- Educate delivery personnel on the entire operational workflow from order collection to delivery, returns, and distribution handover.
- Coordinate effectively with Returns, Distribution, and Operations teams to ensure smooth process execution and clear communication.
- Train and mentor delivery staff on professional communication and building relationships with pharmacy owners.
- Empower delivery staff to drive sales, promote repeat orders, and onboard pharmacies to place orders through the app.
- Conduct onboarding and refresher training sessions for delivery personnel.
- Monitor field performance, identify areas for improvement, and provide feedback to enhance efficiency and sales performance.
- Assist Operations in enhancing service quality and minimizing delivery or process-related issues.

We are seeking a Delivery & Operations Trainer who will work directly with the Operations team to train delivery personnel on app usage, operational processes, and sales generation. This role also requires close coordination with internal teams such as Returns and Distribution to ensure a smooth end-to-end delivery and service experience for pharmacy partners. Key Responsibilities Train delivery personnel on the Healthos mobile application, including order handling, delivery confirmation, returns, and issue reporting. Educate delivery staff on the complete operational workflow from order pickup, delivery, returns, and distribution handover. Coordinate closely with Returns, Distribution, and Operations teams to ensure smooth process execution and clear communication. Train and guide delivery personnel on professional communication and relationship-building with pharmacy owners. Enable delivery staff to generate sales, encourage repeat orders, and onboard pharmacies to place orders through the app. Conduct onboarding and refresher training sessions for delivery personnel. Monitor field performance, identify gaps, and provide feedback to improve efficiency and sales output. Support Operations in improving service quality and reducing delivery or process-related issues.

- Fulfill responsibilities with a proactive attitude and commitment in accordance with the company's directions.
- Submit reports to supervisors on time and take proactive steps to solve problems.

Salary and Benefits:
- Attractive salary, TA and DA, festival allowance
- Commission, incentive bonus
- Other benefits as per company policy
- Opportunity for promotion based on annual salary review and performance.

Requirements: Age 20 to 28 years ‚úÖ Must be 5 feet 4 inches tall. ‚úÖ Must have an interest in selling electronics products. ‚úÖ Must maintain physical and mental health. ‚úÖ Must have the mentality to work in any district. ‚úÖ No prior experience is required. ‚úÖ Must have own motorcycle, separate allowance for motorcycle.

Salary increment after six months.
Festival allowance given twice a year.

10 days casual leave per year after six months.

job_title: Junior Data Analyst (Night Shift - Work From Home)
job_description:
Responsibilities: Future Cloud Bangladesh Limited (FCBL) is a reputable multinational ITES company that has been in operation for over 11 years. We are pleased to offer full-time job opportunities for potential candidates who are willing to work night shifts. Only female applicants are encouraged to apply for this position, and female staff members have the flexibility to work from home.

Responsibilities and key learning areas:
- Conducting extensive online research on North American businesses and their corporate practices.
- Hosting regular meetings with managers, taking notes, and preparing meeting minutes.
- Organizing data in spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, etc.
- Making telemarketing calls and hosting conference calls as required.
- Updating CRM systems, adding notes, and assigning drip plans for texts and emails.
- Maintaining internal communication and completing individual assignments.
- Maintaining external communication with corporate stakeholders.
- Participating in collaboration meetings, workshops with industry colleagues, BASIS, etc.
- Updating daily activities and work status in a dedicated individual tracking platform.

Educational Requirements:
- Bachelor's/Master's students from any UGC approved University/College.
- Diploma students currently enrolled are also encouraged to apply.
- Applicants from any discipline/department are welcome, as all will be treated equally.

Compensation & Other Information:
- Work From Home
- 6 days per week.
- Office Schedule (Night Shift)
- On-time salary.
- 10 paid holidays per year.
- 15 casual paid leaves per year.
- All employees have access to loan facilities, including probationary employees.
- Employees, their parents, spouses, and children receive a 35% discount at Ibn Sina Hospital.

Requirements: Additional Requirements
- Age 18 to 32 years
- Only females are allowed to apply.
- Call center experience will get priority.
- English medium background will get priority.
- Must be fluent in English.
- Experience in sales campaigns will get priority.

company_address: HealthOS Ltd, Khan ABC Tradeplex, Road-02, Dhanmondi, Dhaka, 1205, Dhaka, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: HealthOS is looking for a dependable and organized Junior Admin Officer to support the organization‚Äôs daily administrative activities. This role is designed for individuals who can assist in core admin functions including documentation, vendor coordination, asset tracking, and event logistics ‚Äî all under the supervision of the Admin Officer. The Junior Admin Officer is expected to follow instructions precisely, work with integrity, and ensure smooth administrative execution across both office and operational touchpoints.

Key Responsibilities

- Supplies & Stationery Support:
Assist in tracking office supplies and initiating restocking requests when needed.

- Asset Documentation:
Maintain records of company equipment and infrastructure, ensuring updates are accurate and timely.

- Bill & Utility Tracking:
Monitor rent, electricity, internet, and other utility bills to ensure timely processing and documentation.

- Compliance Document Preparation:
Help gather and prepare necessary paperwork for legal and operational licenses (e.g., trade license, fire safety).

- Vendor Communication:
Liaise with cleaning, maintenance, and service vendors, ensuring work is completed as instructed by the Admin Officer.

- Event Support:
Provide logistical assistance in organizing internal meetings, training sessions, and team events.

- Filing & Records Management:
Maintain organized digital and physical files for all bills, contracts, and administrative documents.

- Data Entry & Report Assistance:
Input data into administrative spreadsheets and assist in compiling reports using Google Docs/Sheets.

Career Path
This is an entry-level administrative position offering valuable hands-on experience in organizational operations, with the potential to grow into a mid-level role based on performance and dedication.

Operational Context
At HealthOS, the Junior Admin Officer plays a supportive administrative role under the direct supervision of the Admin Officer. This position is ideal for individuals early in their administrative career, and includes both desk-based tasks and occasional field responsibilities. The Junior Admin Officer helps manage documentation, vendor follow-up, asset tracking, and event logistics. Precision, honesty, and reliability are critical to success in this role.

job_title: Digital Marketing Executive (Real Estate & Property Background Preferable)
job_description:
Responsibilities: Mannan & Associates Properties Ltd. is looking to hire a skilled and experienced digital marketer for online promotion and lead generation of our real estate projects.

Responsibilities:
- Managing and optimizing marketing campaigns on various digital platforms including Facebook, Instagram, and Google.
- Managing Facebook Page and Ads Manager.
- Creating engaging content (post captions, ad copies, video ideas).
- Increasing real estate lead generation and conversion.
- Analyzing and preparing reports on campaign performance.
- Ensuring coordination with the sales team for lead follow-ups.

Responsibilities: Company Name: AKH Global Service
Job Location: Mirpur-11, Dhaka
Job Type: Full-Time (Office-Based)

Position Overview
- Position: Senior Counselor ‚Äì Study Visa/ Work visa
- Vacancy: 05

- Day Off: Friday

- Ability to work under pressure
- Professional, friendly & positive attitude

Operations & Logistics Mindset: Strong understanding of operational roles, workforce planning, and the realities of logistics environments (shifts, KPIs, field operations). Strong People Judgment: Excellent interpersonal skills and emotional intelligence, with the ability to assess reliability, discipline, and growth potential. Decisive & Detail-Oriented: Confident in making hiring decisions and filtering out unsuitable candidates to protect operational efficiency and leadership time. Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both English and Bengali. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, high-growth logistics or startup environment. Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. Talent Sourcing & Attraction: Collaborate closely with department heads (especially Distribution and Sales) to deeply understand their hiring needs. Write and publish clear, compelling, and accurate job descriptions that attract the right candidates. Proactively source talent through modern channels including LinkedIn Recruiter, tech communities, professional networks, university partnerships, and employee referrals. Candidate Screening & Assessment: Screen resumes and applications to identify candidates who meet the technical and experiential requirements. Conduct insightful initial phone and video screenings to assess skills, motivation, and cultural fit. Utilize your strong understanding of people to look beyond the surface, identifying candidates with true potential versus those with just a polished CV. Interview & Selection Coordination: Act as the gatekeeper for our senior management's time; determine which candidates have earned an interview with our "top bosses." Coordinate and manage a seamless interview process for candidates and internal interviewers. Prepare and brief candidates for interviews and provide them with timely, constructive feedback. Recruitment Operations: Build and maintain a robust talent pipeline for current and future hiring needs, with a strong focus on technology and data roles. Manage our Applicant Tracking System (ATS), ensuring all data is clean, organized, and up-to-date. Responsibilities: Need to handle incoming calls from potential customers related to the Client's business. Must provide excellent customer service and offer accurate information to customers to ensure their satisfaction. Identify customer needs, clarify information, and provide solutions. Actively engage in each call to resolve the client's issues. Should have knowledge about Facebook (Social media), email, and web chat. job_title: Call Center Executive Cum Facebook Moderator
job_description:
Responsibilities: ***Priority will be given to the residents of Moghbazar, Eskaton, and Banglamotor area*** * Receiving and managing inbound and outbound calls. * Providing information related to vehicle to customers and answering queries. * Making follow-up calls to interested customers. * Listening to customer complaints and providing solutions with patience. * Promptly replying to customer messages in the Facebook Page inbox. * Monitoring comments and replying or moderating as necessary. * Filtering out spam and inappropriate comments for removal/hiding. * Creating Facebook Engagement reports. * Understanding customer interests and demands to make proposals.

Requirements: * Must be from the area of Mogbazar or its surroundings.
* Must have at least 1 year of practical experience in call center and Facebook page moderation.
* Priority will be given to those with experience in Genex Infosys / Digicon Technology Ltd.
* Running students need not apply, must work in two shifts (mandatory).
* Must work in the office - not work from home.
* Must have a smart, polite, and humble demeanor, and avoid regionalism while speaking.
* Must have the mentality to speak with patience and interest with customers, giving importance to the customer's statements and providing solutions beautifully.
* Must be skilled in problem-solving.
* Will receive 1000 taka for snacks every month.
* Opportunity for good incentives outside of salary.
* 4 days off per month and opportunity for overtime.
* Working hours: 9 am to 7 pm, 12 pm to 10 pm.
* Educational qualification: Minimum HSC.
* Age: 22 to 27 years.

Responsibilities: Are you hardworking? Do you want to eliminate unemployment? If so, an extraordinary opportunity awaits you! Apply today!

Responsibilities: Accurately fill and maintain documents for the Location Department. Prepare complete identity/ data of the owner of the location to be rented to be submitted to the notary, accurately and on time. Attend calls related to location offers and occasionally meet walk-in visitors Provide data and documentation promptly and accurately when required. Support administrative needs for various branch processes. Manage the submission process for financial documents related to Building & Maintenance operations. Monitor and follow up on building & maintenance issues reported in Helpdesk Online until they are resolved. Lead end-to-end corporate sales activities, from client acquisition and negotiations to order execution and relationship management. Handle and close large-volume orders, ensuring timely coordination with production, logistics, and finance teams. Identify new corporate sales opportunities, tenders, and long-term supply agreements. Develop and execute corporate sales strategies to achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets. Prepare sales forecasts, client reports, and performance updates for management. Coordinate internally to ensure smooth delivery, payment collection, and post-sales support.

job_title: Senior Sales Executive (Raw Materials & Ingredients Sales)
company_address: Plot - 04, Sector - 02, Block - D, Lakeview Road, Aftabnagar, Dhaka - 1217.
job_description:
Responsibilities: Identify and communicate with potential B2B clients including food manufacturers, confectionery companies, and bakeries Promote Raw Materials and Ingredients based on client requirements Prepare and deliver effective Sales Pitch and Product Presentation Build long-term relationships with industrial clients and distributors Ensure customer satisfaction by providing pre-sales and post-sales support Analyze market trends, pricing, and competitor products Propose pricing and product strategies based on market demand Coordinate with Supply Chain and Logistics teams to ensure timely delivery Follow up on orders, payments, and necessary documentation Assist in creating Marketing Materials for the Food Processing and Manufacturing industry Regularly update client data, quotations, and sales pipeline Prepare monthly Sales Reports and Market Feedback Represent the company at Food Ingredient Expo, B2B Trade Fairs, and Networking Events Achieve monthly and quarterly Sales Targets

Requirements: Minimum 1 year sales experience (preferably in the Raw Materials / Ingredients sector) Minimum Bachelor's Degree in any subject Excellent communication skills, negotiation, and relationship management skills Ability to work independently and a mindset for achieving targets Capability to work in a B2B sales environment

job_description:
Responsibilities: About the Organization Chhaya Technologies Limited is a pioneering technology-based organization working to ensure easily accessible and affordable digital healthcare services for the general population of Bangladesh. Through innovative Chhaya Digital Health Packages , healthcare services are being made easily accessible in various regions of the country. The organization is working with a skilled sales team consisting of young, entrepreneurial, and hardworking individuals. Position Field Sales Officer Workplace Field: Any area in the Dhaka division Minimum Educational Qualification SSC or equivalent Experience 6 months - 1 year (Freshers can also apply) Job Type Full-time (Day shift) Working Hours: 8 hours per day Salary and Benefits Basic Salary: BDT 10,500 (fixed) TA/DA: BDT 2,600 (at a rate of BDT 100 per day) Sales Commission: BDT 5,000 - 20,000 Additional Benefits: Attractive promotions, star bonuses, and monthly top performer rewards Other Benefits: Annual salary increment 2 festival bonuses per year Responsibilities Work in densely populated areas such as metro rail platforms, major markets, bus stands, fairs, railway stations, and shopping malls. Directly engage with customers to sell Chhaya Digital Health Packages . Achieve daily sales targets. Collect information from interested customers and register them through the app. Provide daily sales and activity reports. Qualifications Minimum SSC/HSC pass. Must be proficient in using smartphones. Must be enthusiastic and patient in direct sales work. Good communication skills and self-confidence are required. Must have a mindset to work in an outdoor environment. Experience Freshers can also apply. Preference will be given to experienced candidates in sales, customer service, field sales, marketing, or insurance. Contact Head Office & Interview Location: House No. 1230 (Flat 3-B), Road No. 12, Avenue 9, Mirpur DOHS, Dhaka-1216 Contact: 01339774755

Client Handling Communicating with clients via phone, email, and in-person. Providing answers to client queries and resolving their inquiries/issues. Must be self-confident, goal-oriented, and capable of working under pressure.

job_title: Recruitment Field Executive ‚Äì Manpower Sourcing (Overseas Jobs)
company_address: Baridhara DOHS, House 486 Road No. 8, Dhaka 1212
job_description:
Responsibilities: Shomvob is hiring a Recruitment Field Executive to support large-scale overseas manpower sourcing through field recruitment camps, agent coordination, and community-based sourcing. This role requires regular field visits, direct candidate interaction, and close collaboration with local agents and community leaders.

Key Responsibilities:
- Organize and run recruitment camps in different districts and upazilas.
- Coordinate with Training Institutes, local agents, sub-agents, and community leaders.
- Source blue-collar candidates for overseas jobs (construction, factory, cleaning, driving, hospitality, etc.).
- Conduct initial screening of candidates (age, experience, skills, documents).
- Explain overseas job details clearly (country, salary, benefits, costs, process).
- Collect and verify candidate documents (passport, photos, certificates, videos).
- Ensure candidates are properly registered in Shomvob recruitment system.
- Follow up with candidates for interviews, trade tests, medical, and documentation.
- Maintain daily field activity reports and candidate sourcing updates.
- Ensure ethical recruitment practices and transparent communication with candidates.
- Support deployment coordination until visa issuance.

Required Qualifications & Skills:
- Minimum HSC/Bachelor's degree (Bachelor preferred).
- 1-3 years of experience in field recruitment, manpower sourcing, NGO field work, or sales/marketing preferred.
- Strong communication skills in Bangla and English.
- Willingness to travel extensively across districts.
- Experience working with agent networks or community sourcing is a strong advantage.
- Basic smartphone and data entry skills (Google Forms, WhatsApp, Excel).
- Honest, energetic, and people-friendly personality.

Job Type & Location:
- Employment Type: Full-time.
- Location: Field-based (Bangladesh-wide).
- Department: Shomvob Global.

Why Join Shomvob:
- Direct involvement in safe and ethical overseas employment.
- Opportunity to work at the grassroots level with real impact.
- Exposure to international manpower projects.
- Performance-based growth opportunities.

job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for a motivated and detail-oriented Front Office Receptionist (Female Only) to join our dynamic team at Udaipur Destination (Concer of Khan's Kitchen Ltd.).

In this role, you will be the first point of contact for our clients and visitors, ensuring a warm and professional welcome while efficiently managing front office operations.

Responsibilities:
- Greet and assist visitors and clients, providing exceptional customer service and directing them to the appropriate personnel.
- Answer and manage incoming phone calls, routing inquiries to the relevant departments.
- Maintain an organized front office area, including managing schedules, appointments, and office supplies.
- Assist in the preparation and distribution of correspondence and documents.
- Coordinate with various departments to support daily operations and ensure a smooth workflow.
- Perform basic administrative tasks such as filing, data entry, and maintaining records.

Requirements: ```html Required: 2+ years of experience in receptionist/reservation (Hotel/Resorts) or customer care role is must. Minimum bachelor's degree in any discipline (Hospitality/English/Business preferred). Strong verbal and written communication skills. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment. Additional Job Requirements: Age 22 to 30 years Only Female ```

We are looking for a motivated and detail-oriented Front Office Receptionist (Female Only) to join our dynamic team at Udaipur Destination (Concer of Khan's Kitchen Ltd.) Perform basic administrative tasks such as filing, data entry, and maintaining records.

Being a part of the Pathao family means being on a platform to earn the highest income! So why wait any longer? Join us and maximize your earnings! You Can Work When You Want With Pathao, you have the freedom to work when you want. Earn More with Bonuses There are opportunities to earn more with bonuses. company_address: NOVO TOWER, LEVEL 9 270, Tejgaon I/A, Dhaka-1208, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: - Greet and assist customers, address inquiries and concerns, and create a positive shopping experience.
- Receive incoming merchandise, verify quality and expiration dates, update pricing and promotional labels, and create visually appealing product displays.
- Replenish shelves, rotate stock effectively, identify and report overstock for markdowns, and minimize waste.
- Operate the point-of-sale (POS) system, process transactions (including billing, cash handling, voids, and returns), and adhere to standard operating procedures.
- Maintain a clean and hygienic personal workspace, assigned section, and overall store environment, including equipment and display areas.
- Contribute to a collaborative team environment by working flexibly across different sections, actively participating in training programs, and supporting colleagues to ensure seamless operations.
- Promote special offers and gather customer feedback to help achieve outlet sales targets.

Requirements: For any inquiries, please contact 01313054764 or 01999081181.

Greet and assist customers, address inquiries and concerns, and create a positive shopping experience. Replenish shelves, rotate stock effectively, identify and report overstock for markdowns, and minimize waste. Operate the point-of-sale (POS) system, process transactions (including billing, cash handling, voids, and returns), and adhere to standard operating procedures. Maintain a clean and hygienic personal workspace, assigned section, and overall store environment, including equipment and display areas. Contribute to a collaborative team environment by working flexibly across different sections, actively participating in training programs, and supporting colleagues to ensure seamless operations. Promote special offers and gather customer feedback to help achieve outlet sales targets.

Responsibilities: Summary: Pubali Bank PLC is hiring skilled and proactive Queue and Executive for the expansion of Pi Banking services. Selected candidates will be involved in the bank's Merchant Registration and QR Service activation program. Location: Candidates will work in their respective areas (opportunity to work locally). Responsibilities: 1. Assist customers in opening Savings and Current accounts. 2. Verify KYC (Know Your Customer) documents such as Trade License, National ID, photos, and application form as per Bangladesh Bank's guidelines. 3. Provide other account-related services (ATM card, checkbook, mobile banking). 4. Enter complete information into the system including address, bank account, and transaction profiles by filling out forms and uploading data. 5. Capture and upload photos of merchants. 6. Ensure necessary contract signatures with merchants. 7. Deposit documents at the relevant branch and complete the process of issuing QR codes after verification.

Requirements: Please note that no financial transaction is required for the position of QR Executive Officer. Qualifications and Skills: ‚òÖ Must have knowledge of using smartphones and the internet. ‚òÖ Must have a mindset for marketing work. ‚òÖ Must be skilled and confident in speaking. ‚òÖ Must have an understanding of local shops and business establishments. Target and Salary: Minimum of 60 merchant accounts If the target is achieved, the monthly salary is ‡ß≥16,000 Special Benefits: Commission based on target achievement Possibility of permanent employment based on good performance.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Responsibilities of the job:
* Must be proficient in using a smartphone. Our work needs to be done through smartphones.
* All male and female citizens of Bangladesh can apply.
* Work at the district level. Work can also be done in many upazilas within the district. In that case, the responsibility will be given to the respective area with priority.
* Hiring will be done in major divisional cities such as Dhaka, Chittagong, Sylhet, Rajshahi, etc.
* Opportunity to work full-time/part-time.
* Workplace: Respective district headquarters.
* Work: Responsible for onboarding merchants in the area through the branches of Pubali Bank PLC.
* Monthly targets are set, and there are bonuses for achieving targets.
* Salary and bonus for skilled individuals will be determined based on performance.
* Both skilled and unskilled individuals can apply.
* Candidates who have worked in various companies in the field will be given priority. Candidates who have fulfilled the responsibilities of various companies at the field level are preferred.

‚òÖ There is no need for previous applicants to reapply. However, they can attend interviews during office hours.
‚òÖ Candidates must have the necessary documents.
‚òÖ Age limit: Minimum 18 years.
‚òÖ National ID card is required.
‚òÖ SSC pass certificate/marksheet is required. A passport size photo will be needed.

‚û§ Interview time at the office: Every day from 10:00 am to 4:00 pm except government holidays. Support will be available on the mobile number from 10:00 am to 8:00 pm except prayer times. However, text on WhatsApp to the Banglalink number without calling. You will receive a reply, InshaAllah.

‚û§ Interviews will be conducted every Saturday morning at 10:00 am. InshaAllah.

‚û§ Office address: 31/1, Sharif Complex, 10th floor, Purana Paltan, Dhaka-1000.

company_address: Sharif Complex, 31/1, lift-9, purana paltan, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Responsibilities of the job:
* Must be proficient in using a smartphone. Our work needs to be done through smartphones.
* All male and female citizens of Bangladesh can apply.
* At least one person per district and multiple people in the divisional cities will be hired.
* Workplaces: Work in divisional and district cities. Form skilled teams in divisional and district cities, train the teams, monitor and supervise the teams.
* Priority will be given to candidates who have worked in various companies in the field. Priority will be given to candidates who have fulfilled responsibilities of various companies at the field level. Priority in responsibilities is given to their own division and district.
* Work: Collaborate with the team to onboard Merchants in the area through the branches of Pubali Bank PLC. Monthly targets are set, and bonuses are available for target achievement. Salary and bonus discussions will be determined based on the skills of the candidates.
* Skilled and unskilled, everyone can apply.
* Candidates who are entrepreneurial, hardworking, and willing to take on challenges are preferred. Being transparent in dealing with clients, managing, and explaining are important qualities.

‚òÖ There is no need for re-applying for applicants who have applied before. However, they can attend interviews during office hours.
‚òÖ The candidate must have the necessary documents.
‚òÖ Age limit: Minimum 18 years.
‚òÖ National identity card is required.
‚òÖ Bachelor's/Master's pass certificate/transcript is required. A passport-sized photo is required.
Educational qualifications are essential for skilled candidates.

‚û§ Interview time at the office: Except for government holidays, every day from 10:00 am to 4:00 pm. Support will be available on the mobile number from 10:00 am to 8:00 pm, except during prayer times. However, text on WhatsApp to the Banglalink number without calling. You will receive a reply. InshaAllah.
‚û§ Interviews will be conducted every Saturday morning at 10:00 am. InshaAllah.

‚û§ Office address: 31/1, Sharif Complex, 10th Floor, Purana Paltan, Dhaka-1000.

company_address: House No: 1-15, Road No: 14, Uttara, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Magura Telecom is a trusted mobile buying and selling company located in Uttara. Here, mobile handsets, accessories, headphones, chargers, and second-hand mobile phones are available at affordable prices. We are looking for sales representatives to sell products in the store. Inform incoming customers courteously and provide product suggestions as needed. Provide accurate information to customers about mobile phones, accessories, and features of various brands. Actively work towards achieving daily/monthly sales targets. Properly arrange and display products in the store and maintain the display. Handle cash, bKash, cash, or other payment systems correctly at the end of sales. Keep product stock updated and inform about stock requisition when necessary. Resolve customer complaints in a friendly manner or inform the appropriate authority. Maintain cleanliness and hygiene in the store and use branding tools correctly. Inform customers about new models, offers, discounts, and promotions. Maintain accurate records of customer information in the register (if applicable). Work following safety, product security, and company policies in the store. Work as a team with colleagues and follow management directions.

company_name: Lion Industrious Security Service Ltd. Dhaka
company_address: Kajla Bridge, Demra Road, Jatrabari, Jatrabari, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: Registered and licensed organizations will hire a significant number of security guards for the protection and surveillance of domestic and foreign Chinese and Indian projects, mills, industries, factories, houses, showrooms, banks, and ATM booths.

Requirements: No need for experience or guarantee here. Other facilities: Free accommodation. Bonus is given by the 10th of each month. Adequate overtime benefits are available. Responsibilities: Job Summary:
The HR Manager is responsible for planning, developing, and managing human resource functions to support organizational goals. This role ensures effective recruitment, employee relations, performance management, compliance, and HR policy implementation.

Key Responsibilities:
* Develop and implement HR policies, procedures, and systems
* Manage end-to-end recruitment and selection process
* Handle employee onboarding, confirmation, and exit procedures
* Maintain employee records, attendance, leave, and HR documentation
* Oversee performance appraisal and employee development programs
* Ensure compliance with labor laws and company regulations
* Coordinate payroll, benefits, and compensation activities
* Address employee grievances and maintain healthy workplace relations
* Conduct disciplinary actions and internal investigations
* Plan and organize training and development programs
* Advise management on HR strategies and workforce planning

Required Qualifications:
* MBA in HR management.

Requirements: Experience:
* Minimum 3-5 years of experience in HR functions
* Previous experience as an HR Manager or Senior HR Executive preferred
Skills & Competencies:
* Strong knowledge of labor laws and HR practices
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Leadership and conflict resolution abilities
* Strong organizational and time management skills
* Proficiency in MS Office and HR software
* High level of confidentiality and professionalism
Working Conditions:
* Full-time office-based position
* Requires coordination with all departments
Salary Range:
30,000-50,000 
2 festival bonuses 
And other facilities according to company rule

Responsibilities: Future Cloud Bangladesh Limited (FCBL) is a reputed multinational ITES company operating for over 11 years. We are pleased to offer full-time job opportunities for potential candidates willing to work at night shift. Males are encouraged to apply for the same position. FCBL has an amazing workplace at the heart of the town, Banani, for male staff.

Job Responsibilities
- Executing daily voice operations and successfully generating high-quality warm leads across multiple outbound telemarketing campaigns.
- Improving and operating specialized North American real estate management initiatives, primarily focusing on initial portfolio onboarding and management.
- Reviewing daily performance reports to identify discrepancies, revenue leakages, and operational errors for formal presentation to the higher management.
- Liaising with probationary personnel to identify performance obstacles and facilitate seamless cultural integration during the initial onboarding phase.
- Identifying interpersonal or departmental conflicts, developing comprehensive resolution frameworks, and preparing strategic recommendations.
- Researching psychological motivation and emotional triggers to develop, pilot, and refine strategic engagement methodologies for diverse team environments.
- Performing internal audits to mitigate opportunity loss, bridge communication voids, and uphold superior standards for internal and external stakeholder collaboration.

Employment Status
Full-time

Job Location
Dhaka

Compensation & Other Benefits
- On-time salary
- Monthly recreation based on performance
- Yearly recreation based on performance
- Unlimited NESCAF√â
- Yearly 10 paid holidays
- Yearly 15 casual paid leaves
- All employees get loan facilities, including probationary employees
- Employees, their parents, spouses & children get a 35% discount in Ibn Sina Hospital
- Company sponsored 3 Annual programs

Read Before Apply
Go to https://online-voice-recorder.com and record your voice for at least 2-3 minutes with an introduction on yourself (you can speak about yourself, your education, experience, expertise, family, friends, hobbies & etc). The recording of your introduction must be in English. Save the audio file. You can use any other audio recording software too.

Send an email to apply@futurecloudbd.com with an attachment of your resume and the audio recording. Keep in mind the voice recording is to verify you are fluent in speaking English, so give your best try in that audio.

We're expanding our footprint in the HVAC sector with innovative cooling solutions including VRF/VRV systems, chillers, and ducted units. We're seeking a dynamic and target-driven Sales Engineer (HVAC-Sales) to join our team and drive growth through technical expertise and strong client relationships.

job_title: Production Assistant ‚Äì Premium Chocolate & Pastry Brand
job_description:
Responsibilities: Key Responsibilities

- Production Support: Assist the production team in crafting high-quality chocolates and pastries under professional guidance.
- Batching & Preparation: Precisely measure, weigh, and organize ingredients for production batches according to established recipes.
- Packaging & Quality Control: Carefully pack finished products in premium packaging, ensuring they are aesthetically presented and ready for delivery.
- Workplace Hygiene: Maintain strict hygiene and cleanliness standards in the workspace to ensure a food-safe environment.
- Tool & Equipment Handling: Handle delicate kitchen tools and machinery with care, ensuring they are cleaned and stored properly after use.

Operational Support: Support daily logistics and operational tasks to ensure a smooth production flow from start to finish.

Requirements: Safety & Compliance

- Strict Sanitation: Adhere to all personal hygiene protocols, including the mandatory use of hairnets, gloves, and aprons.
- Equipment Safety: Follow safety instructions carefully when operating machinery or handling sharp/hot equipment.
- Safe Handling: Practice safe ingredient storage and handling to prevent cross-contamination.
- Environmental Safety: Maintain a clutter-free workspace to prevent accidents and ensure a safe working environment for the whole team.

Candidate Profile

- Attitude: Honest, punctual, and highly disciplined.
- Education: Minimum SSC preferred.
- Experience: Previous kitchen, bakery, or packing experience is a plus, but freshers are highly encouraged to apply.
- Training: Full professional training will be provided.

What We Offer

- Competitive entry-level salary.
- Hands-on skill development in a premium work environment.
- Long-term career growth opportunities.

Key Responsibilities Production Support: Assist the production team in crafting high-quality chocolates and pastries under professional guidance. Batching & Preparation: Precisely measure, weigh, and organize ingredients for production batches according to established recipes. Packaging & Quality Control: Carefully pack finished products in premium packaging, ensuring they are aesthetically presented and ready for delivery. Workplace Hygiene: Maintain strict hygiene and cleanliness standards in the workspace to ensure a food-safe environment. Tool & Equipment Handling: Handle delicate kitchen tools and machinery with care, ensuring they are cleaned and stored properly after use. Operational Support: Support daily logistics and operational tasks to ensure a smooth production flow from start to finish.

company_address: House# 79, 6th Floor, New Airport Road,Banani,Chairman Bari, Dhaka, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: 1. Client Engagement (Relationship Building):
Understanding the needs and expectations related to visa processing of clients, creating and maintaining a good relationship with them.
Maintaining direct communication with clients and guiding them through the entire visa application process, providing solutions to any questions or issues.

2. Marketing Strategy Development:
Collaborating with the marketing team to create and implement effective marketing plans to attract new clients.
Analyzing market trends and competitors' activities to identify opportunities for improvement.

3. Service Promotion:
Creating attractive brochures, presentations, and social media content in simple language to explain the benefits of visa processing services.
Creating awareness among potential clients through promotional events, webinars, and workshops.

4. Analysis of Client Needs:
Understanding the needs of each client and customizing services accordingly to make them feel valued.
Providing detailed information about visa types, timelines, required documents, and potential challenges.

5. Time Management and Process Optimization:
Creating a specific timeline for each client's visa process and providing regular updates.
Collaborating with the internal team to streamline the entire process for ease and efficiency.

6. Feedback and Improvement:
Collecting and analyzing client feedback to determine areas for service improvement.
Implementing changes based on feedback to enhance client satisfaction and trust.

7. Reporting and Analytics:
Generating regular reports on marketing performance, client numbers, and satisfaction.
Verifying the success of marketing campaigns through data analysis and making decisions for future planning accordingly.

Requirements: Proficient communication skills (in both Bengali and English) Prior experience in visa processing or client service is advantageous Mentality to engage with clients in a professional and empathetic manner Interest and experience in marketing strategy and event management Proficiency in social media, presentation, and content creation Must be skilled in time management and multitasking A proactive and focused mindset in problem-solving Understanding of data analysis and reporting is required Interest in participating in and managing events, workshops, or webinars Commitment to long-term work and dedication to professional development

location: Gulshan, Dhaka, Notun Bajar, Badda, Mohakhali
job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for responsible, polite, and confident individuals to join our team as a Telemarketing and Telesales Executive. The responsibilities of this position include communicating with customers over the phone, providing information about products/services, and assisting in sales activities.

Responsibilities:
- Contacting potential and existing customers over the phone
- Presenting detailed information about products and services clearly and attractively
- Resolving customer inquiries and issues
- Following up with interested customers to complete sales
- Maintaining accurate records of calls and customer-related information
- Ensuring customer satisfaction through polite and professional behavior

Responsibilities: The Digital Sales team relies heavily on field-level freelancers for lead generation. To ensure the Acquisition team has a steady and sufficient lead pipeline for both Shops and Restaurants, we need your support for freelancer hiring for lead generation.

What are our current offerings for the freelancers?

To encourage active participation, we are providing rewards for each qualified lead:
- BDT 75 per qualified Restaurant lead
- BDT 60 per qualified Shop lead
- Payment disbursement: Processed by HR and released by the end of the next month

Qualifying Criteria:
- Leads must be new and not available in Salesforce.
- SKU Limit: 11 items
- All leads must be submitted through the Google Form.
- Leads must fall within existing delivery zones. Freelancers can verify coverage by checking the Bangladesh Delivery Map.

Support & Training:
- The Digital Sales team is willing to conduct short training sessions for freelancers on how to identify potential leads and how to submit them properly.

Responsibilities: Job Responsibilities: - Lead Generation & Telemarketing: Making outbound calls to prospective clients daily to introduce company projects and services. Clearly communicating product details to generate interest.
- Appointment Scheduling: Convincing potential clients over the phone and fixing scheduled appointments or meetings for the sales team.
- VIP Client Management: Meeting VIP and Corporate clients at the office or project sites. You must present yourself as the face of the company with a well-groomed appearance.
- Sales & Negotiation: conducting presentations, negotiating prices, and closing sales deals to achieve monthly targets.
- Follow-up & Relationship Building: Maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential clients through regular follow-ups via phone, WhatsApp, and Email.
- Documentation & Reporting: Drafting professional emails, maintaining client databases in MS Excel, and submitting daily work reports to the management.
- Field Work: Willingness to visit project sites or client offices when necessary to facilitate sales.

Requirements: ```html Additional Requirements Age 22 to 28 years Communication Skills: Must have fluent communication skills in both Bangla & English with a clear and confident voice. Appearance: Must be smart, good-looking, and well-groomed/presentable (essential for interacting with high-profile clients). Attitude: Must be energetic, target-oriented, and hardworking. Flexibility: Must have the mentality to work extra hours occasionally outside of standard office time if required by the business or for urgent client meetings. Tech Skills: Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel), Email drafting, and WhatsApp communication is required. ```

Clearly communicating product details to generate interest. Appointment Scheduling: Convincing potential clients over the phone and fixing scheduled appointments or meetings for the sales team. VIP Client Management: Meeting VIP and Corporate clients at the office or project sites. You must present yourself as the face of the company with a well-groomed appearance. Responsibilities: ```html Gate Control: Inspect every individual entering and exiting the warehouse. Do not allow unauthorized individuals inside. Document Check: Before any truck exits, make sure to verify the invoice (delivery note) and gate pass. Manual Counting / Tally: Count each package or carton manually while loading or unloading the truck. Weight Monitoring: Ensure to weigh each truck on the scale during entry and exit. Lock & Key: Securely lock all warehouse doors and shutters at the end of work and keep the key safe. Perimeter Patrol: Regularly patrol the perimeter fence and warehouse area to check for any suspicious activities. Fire Safety: Enforce a strict "No Smoking" policy inside the warehouse to prevent fire incidents. Labor Supervision: Supervise workers to ensure no goods are being hidden or stolen during busy loading times. Night Vigilance: Stay awake and alert during the night shift using torchlight and whistle. Reporting: Immediately inform the manager if any goods are lost, damaged, or if any issues occur. Benefits: Overtime ```

- 1-2 years of experience in web development.

Responsibilities: Sarawak , Malaysia Introduction Sarawak is located in the eastern region of Malaysia, on the island of Borneo, and is a large and developing state. The automotive and workshop sector is rapidly growing, leading to an increased demand for skilled car mechanics and technicians. Additionally, in the agricultural sector of Sarawak, there is extensive opportunity for Bangladeshis to work legally. Malaysia is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, where regular salaries, good working conditions, and a supportive living environment are provided for foreign workers. Sarawak, in Malaysia, offers Bangladeshi workers the opportunity to work legally and is currently a favorable destination for them.

Responsibilities: 1. Ensure the security of the institution's buildings, assets, and personnel.
2. Control designated entry and exit points.
3. Monitor and maintain records of visitors and vehicles.
4. Provide regular patrols and inform authorities of suspicious activities.
5. Provide necessary assistance in emergency situations.
6. Properly follow the institution's security policies and guidelines.

Requirements: 1. Minimum pass in eighth/tenth grade (according to the institution's policy).
2. Priority will be given to those with previous experience in security work.
3. Must be physically fit and capable of fulfilling responsibilities.
4. Must have honesty, discipline, and a responsible attitude.
5. Must be capable of behaving respectfully and professionally with visitors and colleagues.
6. Must have the mentality to work in shift duties.

Responsibilities: Sarawak , Malaysia Introduction Sarawak is located in the eastern region of Malaysia (on the island of Borneo) and is a large and developed state. The automotive and workshop sector is rapidly growing, leading to increased demand for skilled car mechanics and technicians. Additionally, in the agricultural sector of Sarawak, there is extensive opportunity. As a result, there is a high demand for skilled car mechanics and technicians as well as agricultural workers. Malaysia is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular pay, good working conditions, and a conducive environment for foreign workers' livelihoods. Sarawak, in Malaysia, is attracting Bangladeshi workers for employment opportunities. The regional administration of Sarawak is separate, and currently, Bangladeshi workers can legally go for work. Position : Car Workshop and Service Center Position: Car Body Putty Worker Number of Positions : 8 individuals Responsibilities: Ensure the car body is completely clean and prepared before painting Apply putty correctly on uneven surfaces of the car body Sand the body to smooth out putty imperfections Identify scratches, waves, or imperfections and rectify for a smooth finish

job_description:
Responsibilities: Responsibilities:
- Welcome customers to the restaurant and assist them in a friendly manner.
- Maintain cleanliness and hygiene in the dining area including tables, chairs, and dining space.
- Keep the floor, counter, and customer service area clean and organized at all times.
- Assist in food presentation and packaging.
- Work as a kitchen helper when required.
- Help in food preparation and packaging.
- Ensure proper packaging of food items.
- Adhere to kitchen health and safety regulations and policies.
- Keep the kitchen and workstation clean at the end of the shift.
- Show interest in taking on any additional tasks assigned by the company.
- Participate in teamwork and support colleagues.

Qualifications:
- No prior experience required, training will be provided.
- Must be polite, responsible, and eager to learn.
- Must be mentally prepared to work on shifts, weekly offs, and public holidays.
- Must maintain a healthy and hardworking attitude.

Salary and Benefits:
- Salary: 11,000 BDT per month (monthly)
- Daily: 140 BDT (outside of salary)
- Free accommodation provided.
- 2 annual bonuses.
- 1 day off per week.
- Opportunity for a salary increase at the beginning of the year.
- Promotion opportunities.

Work Hours: 12 hours per day

To apply, send your CV via WhatsApp to 01896107730.

Responsibilities: A prestigious mobile operator is looking to hire several skilled, entrepreneurial, and hardworking candidates for the position of "Business Development Executive" on a permanent basis for their corporate and SME segments.

Distributing free corporate SIM recharge at various offices, NGOs, institutions, factories, schools, colleges, and madrasas.

Selling various digital products and services to organizations.

Must have the ability to communicate with unfamiliar people.

Must be honest, hardworking, and smart.

Must have a smartphone.

Preference will be given to those with experience in fieldwork, computer knowledge, and owning a motorcycle.

Both male and female candidates can apply.
