Commission: Maximum 12,000 Taka
Mobile Bill: 1,000 Taka
Transport Allowance: 4,000 Taka (If motorcycle is available)
Long Term Benefit: 1,000 Taka per month
Campaign Allowance: 4,500 Taka
2 Festival Bonuses per year
Other facilities applicable

job_description:
Responsibilities: Responsibilities:
- Welcome customers to the restaurant and assist them in a friendly manner.
- Maintain cleanliness and hygiene in the dining area, including tables, chairs, and dining area.
- Keep the floor, counter, and customer service area tidy at all times.
- Assist in food presentation and packaging.
- Work as a kitchen helper when required.
- Help in food preparation.
- Ensure proper packaging of food items.
- Adhere to kitchen health and safety regulations and policies.
- Keep the kitchen and workstation clean.
- Willingness to take on any additional tasks assigned by the company.
- Participate in teamwork and cooperate with colleagues.

Qualifications:
- No prior experience required, training will be provided.
- Must be polite, responsible, and eager to learn.
- Must be mentally prepared to work on shifts, weekly offs, and public holidays.
- Must maintain physical health and be hardworking.

Salary and Benefits:
- Salary: BDT 11,000 (monthly), BDT 140 (daily, excluding salary).
- Free accommodation.
- 2 annual bonuses.
- 1 day off per week.
- Opportunity for a salary increase at the beginning of the year.
- Promotion opportunities.

Working Hours: 12 hours per day

To apply, send your CV via WhatsApp to 01896107730.

Responsibilities: Job Description

Job Title: Junior Sales Executive
Location: Green Tiger Electric Vehicle Limited
Job Type: Full-Time

Job Summary:
Green Tiger Electric Vehicle Limited is seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Junior Sales Executive to support sales growth, manage customer relationships, handle customer service activities, and ensure smooth order processing and payment coordination.

Key Responsibilities:
- Identify and acquire new customers through field visits, phone calls, and online platforms.
- Manage and follow up on online and offline leads to convert them into sales.
- Present and demonstrate product features, pricing, and benefits to customers.
- Maintain regular communication with existing customers and ensure repeat business.
- Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and service issues professionally and promptly.
- Process customer orders, prepare necessary documentation, and coordinate delivery schedules.
- Collect payments, confirm transactions, prepare invoices, and submit payment details to the accounts department.
- Maintain accurate records of customer information, sales activities, transactions, and complaints.
- Coordinate with internal departments such as production, accounts, service, and logistics for smooth operations.
- Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to support sales strategies.
- Prepare and submit daily, weekly, and monthly sales and customer service reports.
- Support promotional activities, campaigns, and product launches when required.
- Assist in after-sales service follow-up to ensure customer satisfaction and retention.

Qualifications and Skills:
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (preferred).
- Proficiency in MS Word and Excel is required.
- Proficient typing skills in both Bengali and English are required.
- Prior experience in sales or customer support is mandatory.
- Strong communication, negotiation, and customer handling skills.
- Ability to multitask and manage time effectively.
- Familiarity with CRM software and digital tools will be an advantage.

Key Attributes:
- Strong sense of responsibility and professionalism.
- Excellent customer service mindset with a positive attitude.
- Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
- Proactive, self-motivated, and target-oriented.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Good time management and multitasking ability.
- Attention to detail and commitment to quality work.
- Willingness to learn, adapt, and grow within the organization.

Salary:
Negotiable (Based on experience and qualifications)

Benefits & Compensation:
- Performance-based Incentives
- Subsidized Lunch Facility
- Monthly Mobile Bill Allowance
- Two Eid Bonuses per year
- Annual Salary Increment

Career Growth & Development:
- Clear career progression path
- Training and skill development opportunities
- Performance-based promotions

Apply with CV at: recruitment@greentiger.com.bd

Responsibilities: ```html Campaign Marketing: Company conducts direct marketing and branding activities at various important points in Dhaka city using campaign pickup vans. Product Promotion and Sales: Presenting products of Sirajganj Dairy (milk, ghee, mustard oil, etc.) attractively to customers and increasing sales. Customer Relationship Management: Creating new customers and maintaining long-term relationships with existing customers. Target Achievement: Effectively achieving daily and monthly sales targets. Market Survey: Regularly reviewing the market and collecting information about the prices and quality of competitors' products. Networking: Maintaining regular communication with distributors, wholesalers, and retailers and strengthening the supply chain. Promotional Activities: Actively participating in all promotional and marketing activities of the company. Salary Review: Half yearly Salary & Benefits: Salary: 9,000 BDT + Incentive (Monthly) Sales Incentive Policy: No incentive applicable for sales up to 60 liters daily. (Example: 60 liters x 0 BDT = 0 BDT) If daily sales exceed 60 liters, incentive will be provided at a rate of 4 BDT per liter above the total liters sold. For example: 61 liters sold ‚Üí 61 x 4 = 244 BDT, 100 liters sold ‚Üí 100 x 4 = 400 BDT. This will be calculated on a daily basis and considered as additional income to the salary. Increment: Special increments will be available based on sales performance and achieving specified sales targets. Other benefits: Festival bonus and other benefits as per company policy Earning 18,000 - 21,000+ BDT per month is possible by selling 80-100 liters on average. More sales = more income ```

Responsibilities: 1. Ensure the security of the institution's building, assets, and personnel.
2. Control designated entry and exit points.
3. Monitor and maintain records of visitors and vehicles.
4. Provide regular patrols and inform authorities of suspicious activities.
5. Provide necessary assistance in emergency situations.
6. Adhere to the institution's security policies and guidelines appropriately.

Requirements: 1. Minimum pass in eighth/tenth grade (according to the institution's policy).
2. Priority will be given to those with previous experience in security work.
3. Must be physically fit and capable of fulfilling responsibilities.
4. Must have integrity, discipline, and a responsible attitude.
5. Must be capable of behaving politely and professionally with visitors and colleagues.
6. Must have the mentality to work in shift duties.
7. Must be capable of making quick decisions in emergency situations and informing the authorities.

Responsibilities: Sarawak , Malaysia Brief Introduction Sarawak is a large and developed state located in the eastern region of Malaysia (on the island of Borneo). The automobile and workshop sector is rapidly growing here, leading to a high demand for skilled car mechanics and technicians. Additionally, Sarawak plays a significant role in Malaysia's agricultural sector. Malaysia is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular wages, a good working environment, and reasonable living expenses for foreign workers. Due to the separate regional administration of Sarawak, Bangladeshi workers can legally work in Sarawak, Malaysia. Field : Car workshop and service center Position : Electrician Number of Positions : 8 Job Responsibilities: ¬∑ Regular and major maintenance service of cars ¬∑ Inspection of engine, gearbox, and transmission systems ¬∑ Repair or replace undercarriage parts as necessary ¬∑ Perform overhaul work on engines and transmissions ¬∑ Identify and solve performance issues of cars ¬∑ Ensure car performance by test driving at the end of the job Requirements: Age : 20-45 years Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their own work skills Passport must be valid for at least 1 year Benefits: Salary : RM 2,500 ¬∑ Accommodation : Free ¬∑ Food : At own expense ¬∑ Work Location : Sarawak, Malaysia Delegate Interview: February, 2026

Job Description Job Title: Call Center Executive Job Type: Full-time Duty Time: 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM Responsibilities Receive incoming calls from customers and provide necessary information Handle order taking, processing, and regular follow-ups Contact interested customers for order confirmation Maintain respectful, courteous, and professional behavior with customers Handle other customer support-related responsibilities as needed Qualifications Minimum HSC or equivalent pass Proficiency in speaking Bengali language Proficient in using computers and smartphones Minimum 6 months to 1 year of experience in call center/customer service/tele sales is required Salary and Benefits Salary: 12,000 - 15,000 BDT (based on experience) Performance bonus Friendly and professional work environment Workplace Near Diamond World (Meriment Community Center Road), Mirpur-11, Dhaka. Application and Contact Interested candidates can apply through the Shomvob App . Candidates willing to give an immediate interview can contact for detailed information and job role ( Call Center Executive ) mentioning on WhatsApp . Please refrain from direct calls. Responsibilities: ```html Supervisors must provide full support to achieve departmental sales targets. Provide complete service to customers through communication with them. Ensure highest level of customer satisfaction through customer service. Arrange and display products according to the planogram. Ensure correct packaging and delivery according to standard operating procedures. Adhere to cleanliness and hygiene regulations in the workplace. Follow the rules and regulations of QMS directed by the line manager. Regularly check expiry dates of products and report to the line manager. Maintain cleanliness and hygiene of shelves, workstations, and customer service areas. Assist in receiving, loading, unloading, and shelving products from the warehouse and suppliers. ```

Requirements: ```html Position and Qualifications: Salesman (Only experienced candidates can apply) Educational Qualifications and Skills: Minimum HSC Ability to perform sales and customer service effectively Head Office: 45, Probal Tower, Ring Road, Mohammadpur, Dhaka Workplace: Uttara & Mohammadpur Application Process: Applicants must apply directly at the Head Office with their CV and national ID card Walk-in Interview: From 15th February to 19th February, 10 AM to 5 PM ```

Responsibilities: Responsibilities of Customer Service and Sales Executives:
- Outbound and inbound call management: Making calls to potential customers and receiving calls from interested customers.
- Providing product and service information: Clearly and professionally explaining the company's products and services to customers.
- Lead follow-up and sales conversion: Maintaining regular communication with potential leads and converting them into permanent customers.
- Data management and reporting: Updating daily work tasks and accurately storing customer information on Google Sheets or CRM.
- Providing answers to inquiries: Resolving any customer questions or doubts and assisting with accurate information.
- Achieving sales targets: Meeting the company's defined daily, weekly, and monthly sales targets.
- Maintaining customer support and relationships: Ensuring post-sales services are provided and building long-term business relationships.
- Team coordination: Coordinating with other departments for the smooth running of tasks.
- Participation in training: Attending regular training sessions to learn about products, services, and sales skills.

Courier and Delivery Management:
- Order processing and booking: Booking orders correctly on the courier portal after ensuring customer's order confirmation.
- Delivery tracking: Tracking the current location of the parcel in transit and providing regular updates to the customer.
- Return or parcel follow-up: Resolving any delivery issues or non-receipt of parcels by contacting the courier service and the customer.
- Cash on delivery (COD) coordination: Managing payment received from the courier and promptly resolving any payment-related issues.
- Parcel packing supervision: Ensuring products are packed correctly and sent through the appropriate courier service.

Requirements: Essential Qualifications and Skills (Requirements): HSC/Equivalent pass. Prior experience in tele sales or call center-related work preferred. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong mentality and self-confidence to achieve sales targets. Customer-centric attitude and problem-solving skills. Ability to learn quickly and work under pressure. Additional Skills (Good to Have): Presentation Skills. Problem-Solving Skills. Negotiation Skills. Time management and multitasking abilities. Proficiency in computer and CRM software usage. Experience in customer management through email and social media. Preference given to candidates with proficiency in communication in Bengali and English alongside other languages.

Responsibilities: - Collect blood samples safely (as per clinic protocol) and label samples correctly.
- Perform routine laboratory tests: CBC, biochemistry and other in-house tests as required.
- Operate lab equipment/analyzers (as available in the clinic) and ensure proper handling.
- Maintain cleanliness and biosafety of lab area; follow infection control and waste disposal rules.
- Prepare slides/smears (when needed) and assist in basic microscopic examination under supervision.
- Record test details properly and report results to the doctor/management on time.
- Store reagents/kits properly, monitor expiry dates, and maintain basic inventory.
- Assist with QC/maintenance tasks (daily cleaning, calibration support, logbook updates).
- Support the clinic team during busy hours and handle tasks responsibly.

Requirements: Education Diploma in Medical Technology (Laboratory) preferred (Candidates with relevant science background and lab experience may also apply.) Experience 0‚Äì2 years experience in a diagnostic lab/veterinary clinic is preferred. Freshers can apply if confident to learn and work responsibly. Understanding of biosafety, infection control, and waste disposal procedures. Basic computer skills for record keeping/report entry. Personal Requirements Honest, punctual, and responsible. Responsibilities: Are you hardworking? Do you want to eliminate unemployment? Then an extraordinary opportunity awaits you!

With over 155 years of experience, operating in more than 40 countries worldwide, and holding a prominent position in Bangladesh for over 70 years, American financial organization MetLife offers a golden opportunity to build a career as a Financial Associate.

Responsibilities: We are looking for a skilled Web Developer (Laravel) with a minimum of 2 years of professional experience in developing robust, scalable web applications. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-performance backend and web solutions using the Laravel framework, ensuring smooth integration with frontend components, databases, and third-party services.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop, maintain, and optimize web applications using the Laravel (PHP) framework.
- Write clean, secure, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices and Laravel standards.
- Collaborate with UI/UX designers, product managers, and frontend developers to implement new features.
- Design and integrate RESTful APIs for web and mobile applications.
- Ensure application performance, security, scalability, and reliability.
- Work with databases such as MySQL / PostgreSQL, including query optimization.
- Debug, troubleshoot, and fix application issues; continuously improve system performance.
- Implement authentication, authorization, and role-based access control.
- Participate in code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and maintain coding standards.
- Stay up to date with the latest Laravel, PHP, and web development trends.

- Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Science & Engineering
- Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computing & Information System

- Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Engineering

Responsibilities: 1) Regular inspection and maintenance of water lines, drainage, and sanitary systems in commercial and residential buildings.
2) Prompt resolution of issues related to pipe leaks, blockages, and water supply.
3) Repair and replacement of various sanitary fittings including basins, commodes, showers, and taps.
4) Monitoring and necessary maintenance of water pumps, tanks, and motors.
5) Providing prompt service as per emergency calls.
6) Completing regular tasks following a preventive maintenance checklist.
7) Working in accordance with safety policies and providing regular reports to the supervisor.

Requirements: 1) Minimum pass in eighth/tenth grade (priority if vocational training is available).
2) 3 years of experience in building inspection/facility maintenance work.
3) Must have practical experience in water lines, drainage systems, and sanitary fittings.
4) Must have basic understanding of pumps and motors.
5) Must have the ability to work quickly in emergency situations.
6) Must have a sincere, responsible, and team-oriented mindset.

Commercial or residential complex experienced candidates will be given priority for the job.

Benefits:
‚úî Accommodation in the complex
‚úî Gas for cooking provided.

Responsibilities: 1) Regular inspection and maintenance of electrical lines in commercial or residential buildings.
2) Identifying and resolving faults in lighting systems, distribution boards (DB), circuit breakers, and power lines.
3) Ensuring electrical support for common areas (elevator lobby, parking, corridors, etc.).
4) Monitoring and maintaining generator, UPS, and backup power systems.
5) Providing prompt response to emergency electrical issues.
6) Performing regular tasks according to preventive maintenance checklist.
7) Working in compliance with safety standards and maintaining proper reporting.

Responsibilities: Positivebazar is a socially responsible brand of ours, aiming to improve people's quality of life and create employment opportunities through the safe and nutritious supply of products. We are hiring a skilled, responsible, and leadership-oriented Outlet Manager for our Tejgaon outlet.

Responsibilities and duties:
- Overseeing the complete administrative and operational responsibilities of the outlet
- Taking full responsibility for stock, cash, staff, and customer management
- Ensuring customer satisfaction
- Achieving daily, weekly, and monthly sales targets
- Preparing and submitting accurate and timely reports
- Maintaining discipline, cleanliness, and brand image of the outlet
- Providing training and monitoring performance of team members
- Reporting any irregularities or damages to the head office promptly

Monthly accounts and reporting obligations:
- Submitting the following information in written and soft copy format to the head office's account department between the 30th-31st of each month:
   - Sales Report
   - Cash Report
   - Bank Statement Summary
   - Card Payment Report
   - bKash/Nagad Payment Report
   - Return & Exchange Details
   - All necessary attachment documents (Invoice, Voucher, etc.)

Important instructions:
- No errors are acceptable in sales amounts, return, or exchange entries.

Required skills:
- Strong leadership qualities
- Honest and responsible mindset
- Problem-solving skills
- Communication skills (customer and team handling)
- Ability to handle pressure

Benefits:
- Competitive salary
- Performance bonus
- Career growth opportunities
- Training and development facilities

We welcome a responsible, honest, and leadership-oriented manager to join our team.
Positivebazar - Safe Food, Better Life

Responsibilities: We are a leading manpower recruitment agency looking for a dynamic, energetic, and self-motivated Female Executive to join our team. If you have excellent communication skills and a knack for digital marketing, we want to hear from you!

Requirements: Key responsibilities and deliverables
- Manage end-to-end customer interactions across channels: handle inbound and outbound calls, social media messages, and direct inquiries; follow up promptly to convert leads and resolve issues.
- Develop, implement and maintain a content calendar for social platforms (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn), including post concepts, captions, visuals, and publishing schedule.
- Execute community management: respond to comments, moderate conversations, escalate complaints, and maintain a positive brand voice online.
- Support digital campaign setup and monitoring: assist with organic campaigns, coordinate with paid advertising teams, prepare ad copy suggestions, and track basic campaign metrics.
- Maintain accurate records in CRM or lead-tracking tools: log conversations, update lead status, set reminders, and produce basic follow-up reports.
- Collaborate with internal teams (sales, recruitment, creative) to align messaging, share feedback from customers, and refine lead nurturing strategies.
- Contribute to performance improvement by suggesting A/B tests for posts/ads, refining targeting, and documenting what content formats drive the best engagement.

Required technical skills
- Social media management: hands-on experience publishing posts, scheduling content, and monitoring engagement across major platforms (examples: Facebook Business Suite, Creator Studio, Instagram tools).
- Content creation basics: ability to write clear, audience-appropriate captions and produce simple visual assets (examples: Canva, basic image editing); knowledge of post format best practices for engagement.
- Analytics and reporting: familiarity with basic metrics (reach, impressions, engagement rate, click-through, conversion indicators) and ability to compile simple weekly performance summaries using spreadsheets or dashboards.
- CRM and lead management: experience with lead logging, follow-up workflows, and simple segmentation (examples: HubSpot, Zoho, Google Sheets-based trackers).
- Digital communication tools: comfortable using email, chat platforms, video calls, and phone systems; ability to maintain professional written and verbal records of interactions.
- Basic technical literacy: comfortable learning new SaaS tools, troubleshooting common issues (login, permissions, media upload), and following step-by-step platform guides.
- Lead response time and follow-up completion rate.
- Engagement metrics for social content (likes, comments, shares, saves) and follower growth trends.
- Conversion or qualification rate from social and tele-outreach to next-stage action (appointment, application, demo).
- Accuracy and completeness of CRM records and timely reporting o

Responsibilities: - Greet customers warmly, listen to their needs, and recommend appropriate mobile displays, gadgets, and accessories.
- Drive retail and wholesale sales by demonstrating product features, explaining benefits, and suggesting complementary items.
- Process orders accurately‚Äîaccept customer orders, confirm specifications, enter details, and ensure timely preparation for pickup or delivery.
- Coordinate with procurement and logistics to schedule, track, and confirm deliveries, proactively resolving fulfillment issues.
- Handle point-of-sale transactions, returns, and exchanges efficiently while maintaining a positive and professional customer experience.
- Maintain attractive, well-organized showroom displays and manage stock levels through regular merchandising and inventory checks.
- Stay informed about product specifications, pricing, and promotions to provide confident, up-to-date guidance to customers.
- Follow up with customers after purchase to confirm satisfaction, address questions, and encourage repeat business.
- Work toward individual and team sales targets, accurately reporting daily and weekly sales activities to management.
- Resolve customer inquiries and complaints with calm, solution-focused communication, escalating complex issues when necessary.
- Collaborate with colleagues, share product feedback, and participate in training to continuously improve service quality.
